name: Student Taught Courses (StuCo): Introduction to Chinese Yo-Yo (Diabolo)
base_name: Student Taught Courses (StuCo): Introduction to Chinese Yo-Yo (Diabolo)
long_desc: This course will introduce Chinese yoyo Diabolo to students. Students will learn the basics of tilting, turning, and speeding up a yoyo, doing simple tricks like tossing and catching, and combining basic tricks to create more complicated tricks, combos and routines.  Each week, students will learn about a certain type of trick through demonstration and then practice together to improve their skills, and instructors will help as needed. Each weeks lesson will build on previously learned skills, culminating in a midterm and final performance, where students will design their own routines individually or in a team with the help of instructors, and then perform them in front of the class. Optional fee to buy a personal yoyo and a pair of sticks for 27.00.

custom_fields.goals: To be able to choreograph and perform a yoyo juggling routine that they make, and also understand and analyze yoyo tricks that they see.
custom_fields.key_topics:
Learn the background of Diabolos (Chinese Yoyos), the modern types of yoyos, and understand how to manipulate a Diabolo using a string by speeding, turning, and tilting it
Learn how to link basic tricks together smoothly into performance combos, and match tricks with music in choreography to create performance routines.
Learn how to utilize fundamental tricks to construct combos and learn more complicated tricks
Learn how to learn tricks by yourself so that you can grow by yourself after the course!
custom_fields.assessment_structure: Participation, and a midterm and final performance.
custom_fields.relevance: It enhances their Chinese cultural knowledge and also gives them a fun hobby to do when the need a break from studies. It also links performance arts aspects to culture.
custom_fields.learning_resources: A google drive with additional resources and a youtube playlist with tutorials that summarize meeting agendas.
custom_fields.extra_time_commitment: Students are expected to practice tricks outside of class to have a reasonable understanding of them as we build on more complex topic each week.
